metadata.name: NEO.BRUT_01
metadata.description:
First work from my collection NEO.BRUTALISM.  Picturing an analysis of the present, the result is a dystopian interpretation: the alienation of contemporary life, the city as a grey surveillance device or the work environment in late capitalism as an example of the decaying of all revolutionary ideologies.

2018, Barcelona.
Jpg 5548x4000
